name: MoGu's Adventure
description:
This is a 2D pixel-style platform jumping game, players play as the main character MoGu in an exciting adventure.

This game art, music, sound effects, fonts and other resources are purchased from itch.io resource stores and outsourcing cooperation.

The game is available in simplified Chinese and English.

Contains both Windows and Android executables.

The distribution or resale of this game is prohibited.
